body.name: DeerValley Small Compact One Piece Toilet For Bathroom, Dual Flush Toilet with Soft Closing Seat, 0.8/1.28 GPF High-Efficiency, White Toilet for Tiny Bathroom, 12" Rough-In
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 11 hrs 48 mins
features: Space-Saving Design: Toilet is designed to perfectly fit small bathrooms, maximizing available space without sacrificing performance or comfort. It is shorter and smaller than standard one piece toilets, compact space saving design protrudes just 24.6 inches from the wall.

High-Efficient Dual Flushing: One piece toilet is equipped with a high-efficiency flush system that offers two water conservation options. Siphon Flushing. The full flush option utilizes 1.28GPF, while the half flush option uses 0.8 GPF. These options are specifically designed to save water without sacrificing the toilet's performance.

Soft Closing Seat: The toilet bowl lid closes quietly and slowly, ensuring a peaceful experience, particularly at night. The high-quality compact toilet seat has a soft-closing mechanism and durable stainless steel hinges for added durability. It is easily removable, allowing effortless tightening or cleaning.

Fully Skirted Trapway Design: Modern toilet features a skirted trapway and glazed surface, enhancing its sleek appearance while simplifying the cleaning process. Unlike traditional toilets, it eliminates hard-to-clean corners and grooves, making maintenance and cleaning tasks effortless.

What You Can Get: The package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed water fitting, high quality wax ring, floor bolts and installation instruction. DeerValley toilet is covered by a 1-year warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features 360° Siphon flushing Equipped with a powerful 360° Siphon Flushing mechanism, this toilet ensures a thorough and efficient flush every time. Say goodbye to clogs and inefficient flushing - this toilet delivers a strong flush that effectively empties the bowl with minimal water usage. Quick Release Design Featuring a Quick Release Design, this toilet is incredibly easy to clean and maintain. With just a simple press, the seat and lid can be effortlessly removed, allowing you to reach all corners for a thorough and hassle-free cleaning experience.
PRODUCT INFORMATION The package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and also installation instruction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect For Small Bathrooms
reviews.reviewText: Toilet one piece unit with two flush modes works great thus far. Product arrived very well packaged for safety. Toilet package has easy to follow instructions, wax ring, bag of needed mounting hardware and toilet lid.The only challenge was placing toilet onto the mounting floor hardware because the waterline exits from the floor, and I only had about 1/16 of an inch clearance between water valve and toilet. Just an FYI to check clearances before ordering. Overall it was a breeze installing and it functions great.Happy with its one piece design, functionality, appearance and flushing features. I would recommend to anyone needing a smaller Commode.5-Stars 🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for replacing the one in my 5th wheel
reviews.reviewText: We looked for the perfect small toilet to replace the RV toilet in our 5th wheel. Easy to install and looks great. It is a one-piece toilet, and it arrived in perfect condition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toilet does not create a good seal. The wax ring they send is a joke. Extremely hard to install, wiggles, has a chip in the finish, and the seat is flimsy plastic which cannot be replaced for something more sturdy. I asked company to return and they kept pressuring me to take a $30 refund instead to keep it. They wouldn’t take my return. Now this toilet leaks waste over my floor and it’s junk. I am out what I paid. Very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The seat is very unstable.
reviews.reviewText: I really like the size and look of this toilet. But, the seat moves around a lot when being used. No one who uses it is over 200#. I’m not sure if the seat can be changed to a better one. I have reached out to the manufacturer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This is a good quality toilet. It looks really good with clean lines. Installation is easy even for a person like me who doesn't like to do home improvements. The flushes are good and strong. I like that you can have 2 types of flushes. I took out one star because the seat rim is a bit too narrow making it less comfortable to fit on and it's rather filmsy. I wonder if it would break quickly. It creaks loudly and it just bothers you when you try to sit on it. I can't recommend to anyone as I worry that they feel the same way as me. And then the seat is specially fit to the toilet, so I don't even know if I will be able to find a replacement that can it it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product except seat design
reviews.reviewText: The toilet is a small one & fits in the designated space. It looks good and works well. Be aware the toilet seat does not fit this product. The seat itself is too small and cannot be used at all. You will be forced to change it. It actually hurts to sit on and will leave bruising as it digs into your legs. It’s akin to sitting in a plastic bucket. Warning , but and Install seat prior to installing toilet if you get stuck with toilet. Seller initially refused return. Then gave return after I managed the install in this tight space. Too late to return now. So now to figure out how to install a new seat in its existing tight spot. And more money invested in buying a seat that works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I had the same toilets in my house that were hear 20 yrs in ago when I bought the house. The people I bought it in from must have been penny pincher because the toilets they chose were the lowest rated & cheapest that that could find. After 20 yrs of sitting on them I decided to buy new ones.. I know, who buys a toilet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Replaced a regular sized toilet in a smaller powder room with this little guy. It fits well and looks great. It’s heavier than a normal one and the package it came in needed a dolly to get in the house. The packaging was also a challenge and getting it out of the box took some effort, but it was certainly well protected. It also was more difficult to install mainly because of it being one piece instead of the usual separate base and tank. It’s at least a two person job because of the weight and getting the screws through the side holes required some help as well. Now that it’s installed, we like it a lot.
